getNewObjectTemplate(DataRow conditions!) - method in class CustomConfigurationsBC

getNewObjectTemplate(DataRow predefined!) - method in class SelectionBC

Gets an initialized (predefined) data row, including all data row and field attributes.
This method can be used to set default values for a new data row. If NULL is passed, then a new (empty) data row is returned. This method sets the working data row to this one.

retrieve(int first!, int last!) - method in class CustomConfigurationsBC

retrieve() - method in class SelectionBC

Retrieves a ResultSet with customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selection is set, it will be used to retrieve the desired fields.


retrieve(BBjInt first%, BBjInt last%) - method in class SelectionBC

Retrieves a ResultSet with a subset of customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selecetion are set, they will be used to retrieve the desired fields.

setStateChangeCallback(String methodName!, CustomObject callable!) - method in class BusinessGrid

The widget will call this method to register itself for state changes of the component.
The method should set a callback that calls the method 'methodName' on 'callable!', whenever the state changes.
Event should be a BBjCustomEvent.

validateRemove(DataRow dr!) - method in class CustomConfigurationsBC

validateRemove(DataRow dr!) - method in class SelectionBC

Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be removed. This method is internally used by the remove method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for dependencies before it can be removed.

validateWrite(DataRow dr!) - method in class SelectionBC

Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be written. This method is internally used by the write method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for required or missing data.
